title: Enhancing Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Digital Enrichment for K-12 Computer Science Education in Mongolia

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: This study proposes strategies to strengthen 21st-century competencies through analysis of Mongolia’s K-12 computer science curriculum

Learners can submit one or more instructional design plans structured in three stages (goal setting-activity design-evaluation methods) using AR/VR tools (e.g., Unity MARS, ENGAGE platform) or simulation tools (e.g., Labster) within a week and produce a result that meets four or more of five peer/instructor evaluation checklist items.
Through project-based assessment, learners develop computer science education modules suitable for Mongolia’s educational context
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
